dt: {bc}of a kind or character to be indicated or suggested

dt.t: a bag {wi}such{/wi} as a doctor carries

dt: {bc}having a quality to a degree to be indicated

dt.t: his excitement was {wi}such{/wi} that he shouted

dt: {bc}of the character, quality, or extent previously indicated or implied

dt.t: in the past few years many {wi}such{/wi} women have shifted to full-time jobs

dt: {bc}of so extreme a degree or quality

dt.t: never heard {wi}such{/wi} a hubbub

dt: {bc}of the same class, type, or sort

dt.t: other {wi}such{/wi} clinics throughout the state

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}swilc{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}sulīh{/it} such, Old English {it}swā{/it} so, ge{it}līk{/it} like {ma}{mat|so|}, {mat|like|}{/ma}
shortdef: of a kind or character to be indicated or suggested
having a quality to a degree to be indicated
of the character, quality, or extent previously indicated or implied

dt: {bc}someone or something stated, implied, or exemplified

dt.t: {wi}such{/wi} was the result

dt: {bc}someone or something similar {bc}similar persons or things

dt.t: tin and glass and {wi}such{/wi}
{it}as such{/it} the gift was worth little

usages.pl: Can {parahw}such{/parahw} be used as a pronoun?
pt: For reasons that are hard to understand, commentators on usage disapprove of {it}such{/it} used as a pronoun. Dictionaries, however, recognize it as standard; all of the citations upon which our definitions of this word are based are clearly standard.

shortdef: someone or something stated, implied, or exemplified
someone or something similar : similar persons or things

dt.t: {wi}such{/wi} tall buildings
{wi}such{/wi} a fine person
hasn't been in {wi}such{/wi} good spirits lately
related {wi}such{/wi} that each excludes the other

dt: used to introduce an example or series of examples

dt.t: You will need some form of identification, {it}such as{/it} a driver's license.
"I have my reasons for not wanting to go." "{it}Such as{/it}?"
In cases {it}such as{/it} this (one), it's best to be cautious.
Questions {it}such as{/it} the one you've asked are difficult to answer.

shortdef: —used to introduce an example or series of examples

dt: used to say that something is not very good in quality or condition

dt.t: The meal, {it}such as it was{/it}, was served quickly.
Welcome to my humble home—{it}such as it is{/it}.

shortdef: —used to say that something is not very good in quality or condition

dt: {bc}life is like that and cannot be changed

dt.t: We've had our share of problems, but {it}such is life{/it}.

shortdef: life is like that and cannot be changed

dt.t: Pens, pencils, markers, {it}and such{/it} are in this drawer.
